result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David Y Easterly

records.addlTxt:
Defendant David Y Easterly not in court.  Attorney Jason A Findling in court for David Y Easterly. Attorney Amy E Spanczak appeared in court on behalf of  Attorney Francesco Mineo for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Status Conference. Defendant did check in Via Zoom Video Conference, however failed to stay connected. Discussion placed on the record. Defense provided update to the Court regarding Defendant's non appearance. Defense requested Plea/Sentencing date.  Court ordered case adjourned for Plea/Sentencing hearing. Case remains calendared in Branch 16.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 1, 2023 at 10:00 am.

OFF THE RECORD- Defendant David Y Easterly appeared by video.  Attorney Jeff Schwarz appeared on behalf of Jason A Findling by video for David Y Easterly.  Prosecuting attorney Jon R Josephsen Jr. in court on behalf of Francesco Mineo for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for Status Conference. Parties request an additional Status Conference date. Case adjourned to Br 16.
Status conference scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 09:00 am.

OFF THE RECORD- Defendant David Y Easterly in court.  Annie Louk appeared on behalf of Francesco Mineo for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Attorney Findling informs the court that he is currently in trial on another matter. Court adjourns matter for an additional Status Conference date to Br 16.  Status conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant David Y Easterly in court by video with Attorney Jason A Findling who appears in person.  Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer J. Hermann. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 16.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant David Y Easterly in court.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for Preliminary hearing. State Public Defenders Office needs more time to appoint counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-04, parties are hereby notified that effective 7/30/22, this case will be heard in room 503 of the courthouse.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders. 
 No possession of any controlled substance without a valid prescription.
No possession of any drug paraphernalia 
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant David Y Easterly in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  Defendant David Y Easterly in custody.  Alexander James Geocaris appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Grayson, Branch 16. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for David Y Easterly
Current: 2178 S 5th St., Milwaukee, WI 53207   (Effective: 06-11-2022)
Prior: 3043 North Second Street (Lower), Milwaukee, WI 53212
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
